summary: While Charlie is distracted with the birth of his first grandchild, son Jimmy impersonates his father in order to investigate a murder aboard a freighter in the harbor.
cast: Sidney Toler|Phyllis Brooks|Victor Sen Yung|Eddie Collins|John 'Dusty' King|Claire Dodd|George Zucco|Robert Barrat|Marc Lawrence|Richard Lane|Layne Tom Jr.|Philip Ahn|Paul Harvey|Richard Alexander|Martin Cichy|Ruth Clifford|David Dong|James Flavin|Allan Hoo|Eugene Hoo|Frances Hoo|Hippie Hoo|J. Anthony Hughes|Grace Key|Al Kikume|Faye Lee|Margie Lee|Grace Lem|Arthur Loft|Shirley Louie|Mike Morelli|Anton Northpole|James Pierce|Helen Quan|Constantine Romanoff|James P. Spencer|Florence Ung|Blue Washington|Barbara Jean Wong|Iris Wong|Sinclair Yip
title: Charlie Chan in Honolulu
